overview: Noam Gottesman has been Chairman of the Board and Co-Chief Executive Officer of GLG Partners, Inc. and a member of the board of directors since November 2007. He has been a Managing Director of GLG Partners LP since he co-founded GLG Partners LP as a division of Lehman International in 1995. He has also served as GLG Partners LP’s Co-Chief Executive Officer since September 2005 and served as its Chief Executive Officer from September 2000 until September 2005. Prior to 1995, Mr. Gottesman was an Executive Director of Goldman Sachs International, where he managed global equity portfolios in the private client group. Mr. Gottesman obtained a B.A. from Columbia University.
